recipe.title: Sweet Potato Gingerbread Winter Smoothie Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; mashed sweet potato ; (125 g)

steps.step: In a blender, combine the sweet potato, almond butter, molasses, vanilla, cinnamon, ginger, milk, and salt. Blend on high speed for 3 minutes, or until completely smooth.
Transfer the sweet potato mixture to a small saucepan and heat over medium-low heat until just warmed through. Do not boil.
Pour into a mug and serve immediately.
Nutrition - Sweet Potato Gingerbread - Calories: 480, Total fat: 22 grams, Sodium: 361 mg, Total carbs: 60 grams, Dietary fiber: 4 grams, Sugars: 33 grams, Protein: 14 grams

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a blender, combine the sweet potato, almond butter, molasses, vanilla, cinnamon, ginger, milk, and salt.
Blend on high speed for 3 minutes, or until completely smooth.
Transfer the sweet potato mixture to a small saucepan and heat over medium-low heat until just warmed through.
Pour into a mug and serve immediately.
Nutrition - Sweet Potato Gingerbread - Calories: 480, Total fat: 22 grams, Sodium: 361 mg, Total carbs: 60 grams, Dietary fiber: 4 grams, Sugars: 33 grams, Protein: 14 grams
